document_data.name: Bromthar Helmbrind
document_data.mainbody: '''Bromthar Helmbrind''' was the leader of the [[Red Shields]]. Through his efforts, he changed the Shields from a mercenary company to a strong merchant organization that protected [[Scornubel]] and its trade routes.
